enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying or creating a JSONObject, which can be used to set up the initial state for buildJSONString.
sortJSONObject can be used to prepare a sorted JSONObject that can be passed as a parameter to buildJSONString, ensuring consistent input.
getJSONStringValue can be used to verify the presence and correctness of specific key-value pairs in the JSON string produced by buildJSONString.
getJSONIntValue can be used to verify the presence and correctness of specific integer values in the JSON string produced by buildJSONString.
